comments.body: Can we avoid the comparison between explains when `expectedSimplified != actualSimplifiedPlan`?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +105,109 @@    lazy val explainFile = new File(dir, "explain.txt")
    lazy val expectedExplain = FileUtils.readFileToString(explainFile, StandardCharsets.UTF_8)
    expectedSimplified == actualSimplifiedPlan && expectedExplain == actualExplain
  }
